description: > MEDIUM CONFIDENCE! | Semi-blind sparse affine spectral unmixing of autofluorescence-contaminated micrographs | Semi-blind Sparse Affine Spectral Unmixing (SSASU) for autofluorescence-contaminated micrographs | Semi-blind Sparse Affine Spectral Unmixing (SSASU) | Spectral unmixing methods attempt to determine the concentrations of different fluorophores present at each pixel location in an image by analyzing a set of measured emission spectra
name: SSASU
